name: it's a CATastrophe!
description:
This house was your home - not anymore, since this awful caffeine addicted hooman moved in, you no longer have a clean and cozy place to live. Bastet, the goddess of cats calls upon you, it's time for you to strike back and tell hoomans who is the boss!
"It's CATastophe" is a potentially tense and dense tactical action where you try to damage property and scare the human avoiding detection. It's like Commandos and Metal Gear Solid with cats! You don't have any superpowers. You are the superpower. Now get MEOWing!

Controls:
Arrows - Walk
Space - Jump
M - Meow

Push objects to the ground! Scare the hooman, but don't get caught!
